<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataSG extends data { const CODE = 'SG'; const PREFIX = 65; const REGION = 'Asia'; const PATTERNS = array( '(?:(?:1\d|8)\d\d|7000)\d{7}|[3689]\d{7}', ); const TYPES = array( '662[0-24-9]\d{4}|6(?:[1-578]\d|6[013-57-9]|9[0-35-9])\d{5}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '89(?:[01]\d|2[4-8])\d{4}|(?:8[1-8]|9[0-8])\d{6}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '(?:18|8)00\d{7}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), '1900\d{7}'=>array( 'premium_rate', ), '(?:3[12]\d\d|6666)\d{4}'=>array( 'voip', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{4,5})'=>'$1', '(\d{4})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{4})(\d{4})(\d{3})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{4})(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', ); }
